scenario_text.value:
Hmm, what was this mural supposed to be
again?

This mural shows both your world and ours!
Isn’t that right?

And that’s not all! I remember how you told
us that the worlds are actually connected!

And this thing in the middle is a gate.
A doorway that connects the worlds, right?

Yes, and according to what you told me, my
sister has the power to manipulate that gate.
Which the Master hopes to use for himself.

Likely to cause a catastrophe similar to the
one in that top mural. That we cannot allow.
Right, we’ve got to stop him.

A doorway between worlds... Truly, wonders
never cease.
